<h3 id="X35625">X(35625) = HOMOTHETIC CENTER  OF THESE TRIANGLES: INVERSE-IN-CONWAY AND 2nd TANGENTIAL-MIDARC</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*((2*(b^2+b*c+c^2)*a+2*b^2*c+2*b*c^2)*sin(A/2)-2*(a+c)*b^2*sin(B/2)-2*(a+b)*c^2*sin(C/2)-(b+c)*a^2-(b^2+b*c+c^2)*a-(b+c)*b*c)  :  :
<p>X(35625) lies on these lines:
{1,164}, {174,10473}, {1764,8076}, {3741,21623}, {5208,11889}, {6732,35618}, {7028,35628}, {8080,10477}, {8082,10476}, {8083,11021}, {8084,12554}, {8086,10478}, {8088,10479}, {8090,35621}, {8092,10441}, {8096,35635}, {8098,35636}, {8100,35631}, {8102,35645}, {8104,35649}, {8125,35614}, {8138,35619}, {8242,10480}, {8248,35622}, {8250,35623}, {8351,35620}, {8388,35617}, {8734,35612}, {9795,10453}, {9854,35629}, {10439,11217}, {10444,12727}, {10501,21334}, {10967,11894}, {11859,35613}, {12544,12715}, {12569,35632}, {12581,35633}, {12644,35634}, {12772,35638}, {12871,35639}, {13073,35643}, {13125,35646}, {13475,35630}, {16147,35637}, {17630,35626}, {31580,35648}, {31581,35647}, {34034,34045}</p>
<p>
X(35625) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 35644, 35624), (174, 10473, 35627), (11021, 11896, 8083)<br>
